TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FolderBrowserDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog
Public NotInheritable Class FolderBrowserDialog Inherits CommonDialog
public ref class FolderBrowserDialog sealed : System::Windows::Forms::CommonDialog

span.span: Prompts the user to select a folder.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类使您能够提示用户浏览、 创建，并最终选择的文件夹。This class provides a way to prompt the user to browse, create, and eventually select a folder. 当你仅想要允许用户选择文件夹，不是文件时，请使用此类。Use this class when you only want to allow the user to select folders, not files. 文件夹的浏览通过树控件。Browsing of the folders is done through a tree control. 可以选择仅从文件系统文件夹;无法虚拟文件夹。Only folders from the file system can be selected; virtual folders cannot. 通常情况下之后创建一个新, ，你将设置到从中开始浏览位置。Typically, after creating a new , you set the to the location from which to start browsing. （可选） 你可以设置到的子文件夹的绝对路径初始时会选中。Optionally, you can set the to an absolute path of a subfolder of that will initially be selected. 你还可以选择设置属性以向用户提供的其他说明。You can also optionally set the property to provide additional instructions to the user. 最后，调用方法以向用户显示的对话框。Finally, call the method to display the dialog box to the user. 关闭对话框中时和对话框中因是、将包含所选文件夹的路径的字符串。When the dialog box is closed and the dialog box result from is , the will be a string containing the path to the selected folder. 你可以使用属性来控制用户是否能够创建新文件夹与**新文件夹**按钮。You can use the property to control if the user is able to create new folders with the **New Folder** button. 是一个模式对话框;因此，在显示时，它将阻止应用程序的其余部分之前用户已选择一个文件夹。 is a modal dialog box; therefore, when shown, it blocks the rest of the application until the user has chosen a folder. 有模式地显示一个对话框，不需要输入 （键盘或鼠标单击） 可以在对话框中的对象进行除外。When a dialog box is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the dialog box. 该程序必须隐藏或关闭 （通常以响应某些用户执行任何操作） 之前调用程序的输入对话框中可能发生。The program must hide or close the dialog box (usually in response to some user action) before input to the calling program can occur. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的应用程序使用户能够打开中的多格式文本 (.rtf) 文件控件。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数初始化为其默认值的属性。The default constructor initializes properties to their default values. 当新创建后，属性设置为、属性设置为一个空字符串 ("")，则属性设置为空字符串，与属性设置为`true`.When a new is created, the property is set to , the property is set to an empty string (""), the property is set to an empty string, and the property is set to `true`. 通常情况下之后创建一个新, ，你将设置到从中开始浏览位置。Typically, after creating a new , you set the to the location from which to start browsing. （可选） 你可以设置的子文件夹的路径初始时会选中。Optionally, you can set the to the path of a subfolder of that will initially be selected. 你还可以选择设置属性以向用户提供的其他说明。You can also optionally set the property to provide additional instructions to the user. 最后，调用方法以向用户显示的对话框。Finally, call the method to display the dialog box to the user. 当关闭对话框中和的对话框结果是、将包含所选文件夹的路径的字符串。When the dialog box is closed and the dialog result from is , the will be a string containing the path to the selected folder. 是一个模式对话框;因此，在显示时，它将阻止应用程序的其余部分之前用户已选择一个文件夹。 is a modal dialog box; therefore, when shown, it blocks the rest of the application until the user has chosen a folder. 有模式地显示一个对话框，不需要输入 （键盘或鼠标单击） 可以在对话框中的对象进行除外。When a dialog box is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the dialog box. 该程序必须隐藏或关闭 （通常以响应某些用户执行任何操作） 之前调用程序的输入对话框中可能发生。The program must hide or close the dialog box (usually in response to some user action) before input to the calling program can occur. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的应用程序使用户能够打开中的多格式文本 (.rtf) 文件控件。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置对话框中在树视图控件上显示的说明文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the descriptive text displayed above the tree view control in the dialog box.
The description to display.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以用于指定对用户来说，如说明的附加信息。The property can be used to specify additional information to the user, like instructions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的应用程序使用户能够打开中的多格式文本 (.rtf) 文件控件。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 重置， ，和为其默认值的属性。Resets the , , and properties to their default values. 默认值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of default values, see the constructor.

summary.span: 获取或设置从其开始浏览的根文件夹。

span.span: Gets or sets the root folder where the browsing starts from.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的文件夹和文件夹的任何子文件夹将显示在对话框中，并能选择。Only the specified folder and any subfolders that are beneath it will appear in the dialog box and be selectable. 属性，以及，确定所选的文件夹将为的对话框中时显示，只要是子文件夹的绝对路径（或更准确地说，它指向的子文件夹所表示的 shell 命名空间)。The property, along with , determines what the selected folder will be when the dialog box is displayed, as long as is an absolute path that is a subfolder of (or more accurately, points to a subfolder of the shell namespace represented by ). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的应用程序使用户能够打开中的多格式文本 (.rtf) 文件控件。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

public: property System::String ^ SelectedPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用户选定的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path selected by the user.

value.span: 对话框中选定的第一个文件夹或用户选定的最后一个文件夹的路径。

span.span: The path of the folder first selected in the dialog box or the last folder selected by the user.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为早显示对话框中，具有此路径的文件夹将所选的文件夹，只要设置是子文件夹的绝对路径为（或更准确地说，它指向一个子文件夹的命令行界面命名空间由)。If the property is set before showing the dialog box, the folder with this path will be the selected folder, as long as is set to an absolute path that is a subfolder of (or more accurately, points to a subfolder of the shell namespace represented by ). 如果返回，这意味着用户单击了**确定**按钮，属性将返回包含到所选文件夹的路径的字符串。If the returns , meaning the user clicked the **OK** button, the property will return a string containing the path to the selected folder. 如果返回，这意味着用户就退出对话框中，此属性将具有相同的值在显示对话框之前已。If returns , meaning the user canceled out of the dialog box, this property will have the same value that it had prior to displaying the dialog box. 如果用户选择不具有物理路径 （例如，我的电脑，） 的文件夹**确定**在对话框中的按钮将被禁用。If the user selects a folder that does not have a physical path (for example, My Computer), the **OK** button on the dialog box will be disabled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的应用程序使用户能够打开中的多格式文本 (.rtf) 文件控件。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: for getting the path.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowNewFolderButton { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示“新建文件夹”按钮是否显示在文件夹浏览对话框中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the **New Folder** button appears in the folder browser dialog box.

value.span: 如果**新文件夹**按钮是显示在对话框中; 否则为。

span.span: if the **New Folder** button is shown in the dialog box; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是`true`、**新文件夹**按钮是否可见，使用户有机会创建一个文件夹。When is `true`, the **New Folder** button is visible, giving the user a chance to create a folder. 当用户单击**新文件夹**按钮，创建一个新文件夹，然后系统会提示用户指定的文件夹名称。When the user clicks the **New Folder** button, a new folder is created and the user is prompted to specify the folder name. 在树中所选的节点将成为新的文件夹的父级。The selected node in the tree becomes the parent of the new folder. 实际的标题**新文件夹**按钮可能因而异操作系统The actual caption of the **New Folder** button can vary depending upon the operating system > [!IMPORTANT] > 设置到`false`在 Windows 2000 上无效。Setting to `false` does not work on Windows 2000. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的应用程序使用户能够打开中的多格式文本 (.rtf) 文件控件。The following code example creates an application that enables the user to open rich text (.rtf) files within the control. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FolderBrowserDialog/VB/form1.vb#1)]
